name: C.I.E.V
description:
You're Kanja, a kid who woke up in some strange installations he doesn't know about, but has to get out of there.

C.I.E.V is a videogame demo developed by a team of students from PrimerFrame(Valencia, España). I did almost all the coding of the game and although it is playable, it has some optimization issues. This is my first professional project with a team and I'm proud of the results ^^
